main event: On February 13, 1959, an unidentified object described as a round ball with a tail was observed near Pageland, South Carolina, for approximately 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reported to be very bright, illuminating the surrounding area., It had a white ball and a blue-green tail, resembling a meteor., The object moved very fast with no discernible sound., The observer estimated the object's speed to be around 73 mph and distance to be approximately 2325 feet., The observation was made by an electronic engineer who was considered reliable.
witness description: An electronic engineer who was 27 years old.
